Text:
Thanks! A recommendation though: please avoid to hardcode the sub especially when it's so easy just to include a .srt file in the .mkv container with tools like "mkvmerge" ... 

Stand alone subs at: swesub.nu or undertexter.se
HD move without hardcoded sub: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8193213/The.Oranges.2011.720p.BluRay.x264-PFa_[PublicHD]
